| History                 = The Yamaguchi-Kai Clan are followers of [[Ogun (Ninja) (Earth-616)|Ogun]] ("Radiant Master"), their dead Yakuza oyabun. It's a Yakuza syndicate which is involved in drugs, the sex trade, and guns. After the Ogun's death, leadership passed to the  Fatatsu ([[Karasu-Tengu (Earth-616)|Karasu-Tengu]] & [[Sojobo-Tengu (Earth-616)|Sojobo-Tengu]]), young mutant children who were taking into the clan as babies by Ogun.<!-- {{r|X-Men: Legacy Vol 2 3}} -->

They felt obligated to help the Yakuza clan, even though the kids didn't want to hurt anyone. The Yamaguchi-Kai Clan was confronted and defeated by [[David Haller (Earth-616)|Legion]], who freed the kids from their control.{{r|X-Men: Legacy Vol 2 3}}
